about_the_game:
Hunt or be hunted.


Soulless Steel is a singleplayer top down, exploration, tactical shooter with mechas, inspired by Escape from Tarkov and Hunt Showdown - set in a grim, hostile world tied together with fleeting pockets of community.
You will learn to survive in this world, perhaps climb the ranks to be the greatest pilot, perhaps find out the truth behind this broken world, or side with one of the game’s many factions and corporations in our sandbox-based story.

Build your mecha. Fight. Learn the enemy. Upgrade. Fight again.

Features:

  • Retro futuristic aesthetic. Thermal Vision. Hide in the shadows.
  • Fully customable mechas. 11 configurable slots. 70+ different parts.
  • Intricate and deep combat system. Different mechas have different mechanics.
  • Intense bursts of adrenaline and tension, in-between fear-induced moments of exploration.

content_descriptors.notes: Implied fantasy violence and gore against biomechanical creatures and their pilots.
